text: Antillophos idyllium is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Buccinidae, the true whelks. ==Description== ==Distribution== This marine species occurs off the Philippines. ==References== * Fraussen K. & Poppe G.T. (2005) Revision of Phos and Antillophos (Buccinidae) from the Central Philippines. Visaya 1(5): 76-115. ==External links== Category:Buccinidae Category:Gastropods described in 2005
title: Antillophos idyllium
